title: Passo by Beyond
description_en:
• Payment Plan: 60% during construction, 40% on handover
  • Handover: Q4 2026
  • Highlight: Private pools on the balcony & direct beach access
  • Location: Premium Palm Jumeirah waterfront living
description_de:
• Zahlungsplan: 60% während Bauzeit, 40% bei Übergabe
  • Übergabe: Q4 2026
  • Highlight: Private Pools auf dem Balkon & direkter Strandzugang
  • Lage: Premium Wasserfront auf Palm Jumeirah
description_sq:
• Plani i Pagesës: 60% gjatë ndërtimit, 40% në dorëzim
  • Dorëzimi: Q4 2026
  • Veçori: Pishina private në ballkon dhe akses direkt në plazh
  • Vendndodhja: Premium Palm Jumeirah pranë detit

title: Samana Hills South Phase 3
description_en:
• Payment Plan: 1% monthly installments (5 years)
  • Handover: Q4 2026
  • Highlight: Apartments with private pools
  • Investment: High ROI potential through short-term rental
description_de:
• Zahlungsplan: 1% monatliche Raten (5 Jahre)
  • Übergabe: Q4 2026
  • Highlight: Apartments mit privaten Pools
  • Investment: Hohes ROI-Potenzial durch Kurzzeitvermietung
description_sq:
• Plani i Pagesës: 1% këste mujore (5 vjet)
  • Dorëzimi: Q4 2026
  • Veçori: Apartamente me pishina private
  • Investim: Potencial i lartë ROI përmes qirasë afatshkurtër

title: Palm Central Private Residences
description_en:
• Payment Plan: 20% down payment, 50% during construction (7 installments), 30% on handover
  • Handover: August 2029
  • Property Types: 1-5 bedroom apartments, 5-bed penthouses, 4-bed townhouses
  • Amenities: Private beachfront, multiple swimming pools, fitness centers, 24/7 security & concierge
  • Highlight: Beachfront location with unobstructed sea views, direct beach access & island exclusivity
  • Starting from: AED 2.5M for 1-bedroom apartments (731-829 sqft)
description_de:
• Zahlungsplan: 20% Anzahlung, 50% während Bauzeit (7 Raten), 30% bei Übergabe
  • Übergabe: August 2029
  • Immobilientypen: 1-5 Schlafzimmer Apartments, 5-SZ Penthäuser, 4-SZ Townhouses
  • Ausstattung: Privater Strandbereich, mehrere Pools, Fitnesscenter, 24/7 Security & Concierge
  • Highlight: Strandlage mit unverbaubarem Meerblick, direkter Strandzugang & Insel-Exklusivität
  • Ab: AED 2.5M für 1-Schlafzimmer Apartments (68-77 m²)
description_sq:
• Plani i Pagesës: 20% avans, 50% gjatë ndërtimit (7 këste), 30% në dorëzim
  • Dorëzimi: Gusht 2029
  • Llojet e Pronave: Apartamente 1-5 dhoma gjumi, Penthouse 5-dhoma, Townhouse 4-dhoma
  • Lehtësira: Plazh privat, pishina të shumta, qendra fitnesi, siguri & concierge 24/7
  • Veçori: Vendndodhje në bregdet me pamje të pakufizuara të detit, akses direkt në plazh & ekskluzivitet ishull
  • Duke filluar nga: AED 2.5M për apartamente 1-dhomëshe (68-77 m²)
